style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#fff2cc;strokeColor=#d6b656;" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="1210" y="540" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Uh6MecEdrxuu81NjNK9B-51" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" source="Uh6MecEdrxuu81NjNK9B-32" target="Uh6MecEdrxuu81NjNK9B-50" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Uh6MecEdrxuu81NjNK9B-32" value="发现歧视样本" style="rhombus;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#f8cecc;strokeColor=#b85450;" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="630" y="470" width="150" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Uh6MecEdrxuu81NjNK9B-34" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" source="Uh6MecEdrxuu81NjNK9B-33" target="Uh6MecEdrxuu81NjNK9B-32" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Uh6MecEdrxuu81NjNK9B-33" value="可解释工具" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#d5e8d4;strokeColor=#82b366;" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="620" y="360" width="80" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Uh6MecEdrxuu81NjNK9B-37" value="<h1 style="text-align: center; margin-top: 0px; line-height: 125%;">发现歧视样本算法</h1><p style="line-height: 125%;">首先使用&nbsp;可解释工具（SHAP）和预分类器（Xgboost）和计算每个样本的 shapley&nbsp;值</p><p style="line-height: 125%;">找到&nbsp;M&nbsp;个最不公平的样本，即敏感属性影响最大的样本</p><p style="line-height: 125%;">如果</p>" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=1;fillColor=#f8cecc;strokeColor=#b85450;align=left;gradientColor=none;dashed=1;perimeterSpacing=10;" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="465" y="700" width="310" height="150" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Uh6MecEdrxuu81NjNK9B-39" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" source="Uh6MecEdrxuu81NjNK9B-38" target="Uh6MecEdrxuu81NjNK9B-32" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Uh6MecEdrxuu81NjNK9B-38" value="预分类器" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#d5e8d4;strokeColor=#82b366;" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="720" y="360" width="70" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Uh6MecEdrxuu81NjNK9B-47" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" source="Uh6MecEdrxuu81NjNK9B-42" target="Uh6MecEdrxuu81NjNK9B-19" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Uh6MecEdrxuu81NjNK9B-42" value="新的保护属性集&nbsp;D+" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#fff2cc;strokeColor=#d6b656;" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="1020" y="480" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Uh6MecEdrxuu81NjNK9B-48" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" source="Uh6MecEdrxuu81NjNK9B-44" target="Uh6MecEdrxuu81NjNK9B-19" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Uh6MecEdrxuu81NjNK9B-44" value="新的保护属性集&nbsp;D-" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#fff2cc;strokeColor=#d6b656;" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="1020" y="600" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Uh6MecEdrxuu81NjNK9B-45" value="" style="endArrow=none;dashed=1;html=1;rounded=0;exitX=1;exitY=0.5;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" source="Uh6MecEdrxuu81NjNK9B-13" target="Uh6MecEdrxuu81NjNK9B-44" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="840" y="640" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="890" y="590" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Uh6MecEdrxuu81NjNK9B-46" value="<font style="font-size: 16px;">与上面相同步骤</font>" style="edgeLabel;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];" parent="Uh6MecEdrxuu81NjNK9B-45" vertex="1" connectable="0"> <mxGeometry x="-0.096" y="3" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="12" as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Uh6MecEdrxuu81NjNK9B-52" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" source="Uh6MecEdrxuu81NjNK9B-50" target="Uh6MecEdrxuu81NjNK9B-42" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Uh6MecEdrxuu81NjNK9B-50" value="消除歧视" style="rhombus;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#f8cecc;strokeColor=#b85450;" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="832" y="470" width="150" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Uh6MecEdrxuu81NjNK9B-55" value="<h1 style="margin-top: 0px; line-height: 125%;">消除歧视算法</h1><p style="line-height: 125%;"><span style="background-color: initial;">使用&nbsp;KNN&nbsp;算法找到最相近的</span></p><p style="line-height: 125%;"><span style="background-color: initial;">k&nbsp;个样本，更改标签</span><br></p>" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=1;fillColor=#f8cecc;strokeColor=#b85450;align=center;gradientColor=none;dashed=1;perimeterSpacing=10;labelPosition=center;verticalLabelPosition=middle;verticalAlign=middle;" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="810" y="700" width="310" height="150" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="7NVkhh-tFvpGjTW78m_9-1" style="edgeStyle=none;curved=1;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;fontSize=12;startSize=8;endSize=8;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;" edge="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" source="7NVkhh-tFvpGjTW78m_9-0" target="Uh6MecEdrxuu81NjNK9B-50"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="7NVkhh-tFvpGjTW78m_9-0" value="KNN 分类器" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#d5e8d4;strokeColor=#82b366;" vertex="1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1"> <mxGeometry x="847" y="360" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

div.p: 首先使用 可解释工具（SHAP）和预分类器（Xgboost）和计算每个样本的 shapley 值
找到 M 个最不公平的样本，即敏感属性影响最大的样本

p.span: 使用 KNN 算法找到最相近的

switch.text: 消除歧视算法使用 KNN 算法找到最相近的...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 30px; margin-left: 578px;
